channel.title: Hello How to?
channel.description:
Hey People And moparscape Members>!
Im a trouble that SYIpkpkers i cannot get rid of them how can i get rid of them. Please help me out also they are crashing my server, im realy mad :( at them please people help my server out i wanto make it popular please people help my dedi server out =)
i beg you people help.
Regards:
Demien
Hope you guys help meh

Guyz These Anti doesnt work in my server I think its beacuse i got PvP server?

Please Guys My server always goes off when i weak up. example in (google) =R0nel0cus= it saying 100% then next day 30%

And can you guys please please help me through teamviewer =) Might be glad if you help me.

item.title: Hello How to?
item.dc:creator: @tracuer93 tracuer93
item.description:
@tracuer93 wrote:

search button there’s tutorials out there :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 03:21:54 pm[/size][hr]my antisyi.java file for him

[code]import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Iterator;

public class SYIBlocker
{

public SYIBlocker()
{
}

public static final void start()
{
    addCrasher("SYIpkpker");
}

public static final void addCrasher(String s)
{
    Names.add(s.toLowerCase());
}

public static final boolean bannedSYI(String s)
{
    s = s.toLowerCase();
    for(Iterator iterator = Names.iterator(); iterator.hasNext();)
    {
        String s1 = (String)iterator.next();
        if(s.contains(s1))
            return true;
    }

    char ac[] = s.toCharArray();
    int i = ac.length;
    for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)
    {
        Character character = Character.valueOf(ac[j]);
        if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(character.charValue()) && Character.isSpaceChar(character.charValue()) && !Character.isSpaceChar(character.charValue()))
            return true;
    }

    return false;
}

public static final void banIP(String s)
{
    Addresses.add(s.toLowerCase());
}

public static final boolean bannedIP(String s)
{
    s = s.toLowerCase();
    for(Iterator iterator = Addresses.iterator(); iterator.hasNext();)
    {
        String s1 = (String)iterator.next();
        if(s1.equals(s))
            return true;
    }

    return false;
}

public static ArrayList Names = new ArrayList();
public static ArrayList Addresses = new ArrayList();

}
[/code]

Read full topic
